title: OnwardMobility loses rights to BlackBerry brand, killing 5G device release hopes
content:
Just a month after claiming that the company was not dead, it seems that OnwardMobility’s aim of bringing a 5G BlackBerry to market is, in fact, dead.

more…

The post OnwardMobility loses rights to BlackBerry brand, killing 5G device release hopes appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A month after claiming that the company was not dead, OnwardMobility's aim of bringing a 5G BlackBerry to market is, in fact, dead.
